channel.title: Help with adding a NPC (Noob)
channel.description:
Hello,
I am new to scripting and I want to learn. So I wanted to add a Jad Minigame to my server. So I wanted to know what the script would look like I wanted to be able to do this: When a player types ::jad he teles to a area I am thinking about (I know the co-oords) when he is there he sees the jad and attacks it once it is dead he gets 10 mill and fire cape.
So can someone tell me how the code looks and explain to me what they did and where to add each part of the code. Please and thanks :D! Also if it is possible can someone tell me where I can add objects and where I can edit item prices.

item.title: Help with adding a NPC (Noob)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

That would be client.java in your source files. Search for: public void NewObjects() {
Then under it, there should be a buttload of lines that look like this: makeGlobalObject(3509, 9496, 3831, 0, 10);

To add an object, you follow that same code, just change the x/y coords and the object id.
So, to add one, you would do this: makeGlobalObject(xcoords, ycoords, IDoftheobject, 0, 10);

Np.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding a NPC (Noob)
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[quote=“busta123, post:4, topic:314517”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=410993.msg3031457#msg3031457 date=1258414053]
On a much more detailed note…

First go into client.java and add this command

if(command.startsWith("jad")) {
toX = 3027;
toY = 3742;
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 3021, 3751, heightLevel);
sM("Good Luck Killing Jad");
}

Than go into Npchandler.java and look for

(npcs[i].DeadApply == true)

Should see things like

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1153 && temp.taskID == 1153) { temp.addSkillXP(150, 18); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one."); } }

Add

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { temp.toX = ; temp.toY = ; temp.heightLevel = 0; temp.addItem(6570, 1); temp.addItem(995, 10000000); temp.sM("You Have Killed Jad! Well Done!"); }
[/quote]

Wow thanks added jad how can I add items? like objects such as gates and fences around him?[/quote]

client.java

search

 makeglobalobject

the order of the #'s are

x-value,y-value,object ID, direction, height(dont change the height)

^^ correct if im wrong on those

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding a NPC (Noob)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

On a much more detailed note…

First go into client.java and add this command

if(command.startsWith("jad")) {
toX = ;
toY = ;
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, ####, ####, heightLevel);
sM("Good Luck Killing Jad");
}

Than go into Npchandler.java and look for

(npcs[i].DeadApply == true)

Should see things like

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1153 && temp.taskID == 1153) { temp.addSkillXP(150, 18); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one."); } }

Add

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { temp.toX = ; temp.toY = ; temp.heightLevel = 0; temp.addItem(6570, 1); temp.addItem(995, 10000000); temp.sM("You Have Killed Jad! Well Done!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding a NPC (Noob)
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Add the npc in autospawn.cfg. For the command add something like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("jad") { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }

Read full topic
